valid_articles.Title: RT by @aleyda: Google’s AI Overview Search Results Copied My Original Work by @reece___rogers. valid_articles.Description: A retweet by @carlhendy of a post by @aleyda about Google's AI Overview Search Results allegedly copying original work. The original post links to an article by @reece___rogers. The Google spokesperson claims that links in AI Overviews get more clicks, but there's no data to support this.
